hero.title: E-Expense Note
hero.subtitle: Digital Expense and Tax Compliance Solutions
hero.description: Digitalize your expense documentation process for transactions with non-taxpayers to achieve speed, accuracy and compliance. ESM E-Expense Note enables the electronic creation, signing, transmission and storage of all expense receipts, fully compliant with the Turkish Revenue Administration (TRA) standards. It eliminates paper-based workflows, ensures legal validity and enhances operational efficiency.

overview.title: Why Choose E-Expense Note?
overview.description: E-Expense Note simplifies expense management for transactions with individuals and small suppliers, bringing speed, transparency and compliance to the process. ESM E-Expense Note allows all expense receipts to be generated and transmitted electronically, ensuring full compliance with tax regulations and data security standards. With its intuitive interface, approvals and submissions are completed within seconds.

benefits: Eliminates paper, printing and storage costs
Automatically generates and transmits expense documents
Speeds up operations and minimizes human error
Provides secure digital archiving and instant access to all records
